data.eml:eml: A taxonomic review of the genus Junnanotrechus Uéno & Yin, 1993 (Coleoptera: Carabidae: Trechinae), with description of six new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Belousov, Igor A., Kabak, Ilya I. (2014): A taxonomic review of the genus Junnanotrechus Uéno & Yin, 1993 (Coleoptera: Carabidae: Trechinae), with description of six new species. Zootaxa 3811 (4): 401-437, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3811.4.1
